title: Translation of "shock cardiogénico" into English

cardiogenic shock is the translation of "shock cardiogénico" into English. Sample translated sentence: Ahora, ¿Alguien me quiere dar el protocolo para shock cardiogénico? ↔ Now, does anybody want to give me the protocol for cardiogenic shock?

En la tabla 3-4 se presentan las causas del shock cardiogénico.
Table 3.4 lists the causes of cardiogenic shock.
Estaba en shock cardiogénico
He was in profound cardiogenic shock.
Describir la fisiopatología del shock hipovolémico, shock distributivo y shock cardiogénico.
Distinguish between the pathophysiology of hypovolemic shock, distributive shock, and cardiogenic shock.
fibrilación, disociación electromecánica (DEM), paro cardiaco, shock cardiogénico y reinfarto
fibrillation, electromechanical dissociation (EMD)), cardiac arrest, cardiogenic shock and reinfarction
Las causas más comunes de shock cardiogénico son las cardiopatías congénitas, la miocarditis y las miocardiopatías.
The most common causes of cardiogenic shock are congenital heart disease, myocarditis, and cardiomyopathies.
Bradicardia sinusal, bloqueo auriculoventricular de segundo o tercer grado, insuficiencia cardiaca evidente o shock cardiogénico
Sinus bradycardia, second or third degree atrioventricular block, overt cardiac failure, or cardiogenic shock
La causa de muerte es shock cardiogénico.
Cause of death is cardiogenic shock.
Los efectos cardíacos pueden incluir bloqueo cardíaco, disociación AV y asístole, y shock cardiogénico con edema pulmonar
Cardiac effects may include heart block, AV dissociation and asystole, and cardiogenic shock with pulmonary oedema
La terapia farmacológica del shock cardiogénico está determinada por la patofisiología subyacente.
The pharmacological therapy of cardiogenic shock is determined by the underlying pathophysiology.
Murió de shock cardiogénico en la 37va hora de experimentación.
Died of cardiogenic shock in the 37th hour of experimentation.
si sufre shock cardiogénico (un problema cardíaco tratado en el hospital
if you are suffering from cardiogenic shock (a heart condition treated in hospital

“I’ve got a patient in cardiogenic shock that I’ve got to see.”

Now, does anybody want to give me the protocol for cardiogenic shock?

Our film today deals with the newest methods of treating cardiogenic shock

Alguien había gritado: «No tiene pulso», y luego un médico había dicho algo sobre un «shock cardiogénico».
Someone had called out “No pulse,” and then the doctor said something about “cardiogenic shock.”
Para diferenciar entre el shock cardiógenico y no cardiogénico y para guiar su asistencia farmacológica o mecánica. 3.
To differentiate between cardiogenic and noncardiogenic shock and to guide its pharmacologic or mechanical support. 3.
Shock cardiogénico.
Cardiogenic Shock.
Los dos mecanismos se denominan respectivamente shock cardiogénico e hipovolémico.
The two mechanisms are called, respectively, cardiogenic and hypovolemic shock.
La permeabilidad vascular pulmonar se complica con shock cardiogénico, asociado a un aumento de la resistencia vascular.
Pulmonary vascular permeability is complicated by cardiogenic shock associated with increased vascular resistance.

Sinus tachycardia accompanying a myocardial infarction may be indicative of cardiogenic shock.
si ha experimentado un colapso causado por un problema cardiaco (shock cardiogénico
if you have experienced a collapse which was caused by a heart problem (cardiogenic shock
